sentences.english: The principal Li Gongyan to enter the room her husband.

sentences.english: I'm talking about how you work as a client for a project that needs to make something.
sentences.chinese: 我说的是你如何成功扮演一位要达成某专案的委托人。

sentences.english: A great lawyer-client relationship can last a lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 一个好的律师与委托人关系，是可以持续一辈子的。

sentences.english: The chairman's lawyer has declared that his client is innocent.
sentences.chinese: 但森西的律师坚持称，他的委托人是清白的。

sentences.english: Our relationship with our clients goes beyond the usual professional-customer level.
sentences.chinese: 我们与客人不只一般专业人仕对委托人的关系。

sentences.english: The bodies of trust property transfer legal relation include settlor and accepter .
sentences.chinese: 财产转移法律关系的主体为委托人和财产接受人。

sentences.english: Both the principals and agents shall be published by the villagers' electoral committee.
sentences.chinese: 村民选举委员会应当公布委托人和受委托人的名单。

sentences.english: Both the principals and agents shall be published by the villagers' electoral committee.
sentences.chinese: 村民选举委员会应当公布委托人和受委托人的名单。

sentences.english: The clients shall sign written entrustment contracts for dismantlement appraisal with the appraisal institutions.
sentences.chinese: 委托人应当与估价机构签订书面拆迁估价委托合同。

sentences.english: However, it is also endowed with the reversible right to the trustor in Trust Law of China.
sentences.chinese: 然而，中国信托法也同时将该撤销权赋予了委托人。

sentences.english: Article 398 The principal shall pay in advance the expenses for handling the entrusted affairs.
sentences.chinese: 第三百九十八条委托人应当预付处理委托事务的费用。

sentences.english: Three, this center request a client function virtuous, the attitude is honest.
sentences.chinese: 本中心要求委托人作风正派，态度诚实。

sentences.english: Nemanja Vidic's agent has dismissed talk of the Manchester United captain leaving Old Trafford.
sentences.chinese: 维迪奇的经纪人否认自己的委托人会离开曼联。

sentences.english: I must consult my principal on this matter.
sentences.chinese: 这件事我必须与委托人商量一下。

sentences.english: Article 398 The principal shall prepay the expenses for handling the entrusted affair.
sentences.chinese: 第三百九十八条委托人应当预付处理委托事务的费用。
